title: Kat E Going Farther
body: I was playing my first game of the preseason as shaco and there was a katarina on the enemy team. I used my clone to get away but as she e'd my clone, it teleported to me (because I walked out of range) and she followed with my clone. Is that supposed to happen?

replies.body:
Lol.

Yes, all targeted abilities with travel time can do this, often with bizarre and hilarious effect. Only dashes that make you untargetable, like ekko R, block this.

Projectiles can also chase you across the map.
i think its because thaey added the delay to her e that this can happen now

Her E doesn't have a delay. They just reworked it so all the idiotic CCs and you included to teleport in such stupid conditions, which is horrible because skillshots that should of missed you just teleport with you and hit you...
Yep.  Targeted attacks will hit their target.  It's why you cannot flash dodge the final banana. {{champion:16}}
If she E's the exact milisecond your clone teleports back to your position, happens once in a blue moon =D
